long_description: The Country Mud is one of the most versatile off-road tires available-it's equally at home in loose terrain as it is in mud. Large tread knobs promote traction and astonishing grip, even in wet conditions. Rubber mix is charged with carbon black, which promotes an extremely low wear rate. This four-season tire delivers impressive durability and puncture resistance.
short_description: The Country Mud is one of the most versatile off-road tires available-it's equally at home in loose terrain as it is in mud.
